NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}."}],"AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount(address,bytes32)":[{"details":"The `account` is missing a role."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"events":{"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call. This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addRewards(uint256)":{"details":"Adds rewards to the distribution pool","params":{"amount":"The amount of rewards to add"}},"constructor":{"details":"Constructor to set initial values","params":{"_admin":"Address of the admin","_rewardsToken":"Address of the rewards token"}},"distributeRewards(address)":{"details":"Distributes rewards to a user","params":{"user":"The address of the user"},"returns":{"_0":"The amount of rewards distributed"}},"earned(address)":{"details":"Calculates the earned rewards for a user","params":{"user":"The address of the user"},"returns":{"_0":"The earned rewards"}},"getAccruedRewards(address)":{"details":"Returns the amount of rewards accrued by a user","params":{"user":"The address of the user"},"returns":{"_0":"The amount of rewards accrued"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. XB2Dh9np5Uf29Na3pQ7tafRS684wd3GLjVL"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa00be322d7db5786750ce0ac7e2f5b633ac30a5ed5fa1ced1e74acfc19acecea","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6c84e822f87cbdc4082533b626667b6928715bb2b1e8e7eb96954cebb9e38c8d","dweb:/ipfs/QmZmy9dgxLTerBAQDuuHqbL6EpgRxddqgv5KmwpXYVbKz1"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/SafeCast.sol":{"keccak256":"0x195533c86d0ef72bcc06456a4f66a9b941f38eb403739b00f21fd7c1abd1ae54","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b1d578337048cad08c1c03041cca5978eff5428aa130c781b271ad9e5566e1f8","dweb:/ipfs/QmPFKL2r9CBsMwmUqqdcFPfHZB2qcs9g1HDrPxzWSxomvy"]},"src/RewardsDistributor.sol":{"keccak256":"0xfb8a8ff1ccaaf8c06103f478ae9ff3e276e845016c7191979afb668f644db369","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://0196a0652cc31a27b57975ba4a2ba88845061d64b60578194c10b6af12eced19","dweb:/ipfs/QmRNEYcM5fRfxVQmjqWacUP1GsUdjqCiDbSVkphoFc8b1V"]},"src/interfaces/IRewardsDistributor.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2c012e1b114bd607914e38dfcca5b49c0a07c82aeb9ae227d0231245138787b1","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b58cf2449c4eb38e0f83f52f49754fc00b4d9bb6c589b0cc0c4078cdd5e6a002","dweb:/ipfs/QmQtwT5Mrn1hhbBQ9goaUBqDiSTwDi68KXyPbZFv7ZA3fe"]}},"version":1}

addRewards(uint256).details: Adds rewards to the distribution pool

params.amount: The amount of rewards to add

earned(address).details: Calculates the earned rewards for a user

getAccruedRewards(address).details: Returns the amount of rewards accrued by a user

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

lastTimeRewardApplicable().details: Returns the last time rewards were applicable (either now or periodFinish)

recoverERC20(address,uint256).details: Allows admin to recover tokens sent to the contract by mistake

params.tokenAddress: The address of the token to recover
params.tokenAmount: The amount of tokens to recover

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

setRewardsDuration(uint256).details: Updates the duration of the rewards period

params._rewardsDuration: The new duration of the rewards period

updateUserRewards(address,uint256,uint25.details: Updates user rewards when balance changes

params.newBalance: The new balance of the user
params.oldBalance: The old balance of the user
